name: SpaceOWL
short_description:
The SpaceOWL project proposes to develop a range of ontological knowledge resources, describing the semantics of present and historic features in subject areas of near-space and deep-space astronomy, crewed and crewless space vehicles, space and aerospace business, and formal, institutional programs in space science and space exploration.

Updates about the progress of design and development in the SpaceOWL Project are published via the SpaceOWL Project's Development 'Blog.
summary: Semantic Models of Space Exploration, Near and Deep Space Astronomy
